author: Paul Rankin
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4.To make the caramelised pineapple, melt the butter for 2-3 minutes in an oven-proof saucepan.  Add pineapple wedges, brown sugar and vanilla. Place into the preheated oven for four minutes. To make the sabayon, over a pan of simmering water place the sabayon ingredients into a bowl.  Whisk constantly over medium heat until light and doubled in size, for 3-4 minutes. Serve the caramelised pineapple with the sabayon sauce on the side.
ingredients: 50g/1¾oz butter,  ½ pineapple,  core removed and cut into three wedges,  50g/1¾oz brown sugar,  1 vanilla pod, split in half, seeds scraped out,  1 free-range egg yolk,  3 tbsp white wine,  50g/1¾oz caster sugar
